review:
Hi Readers, It's my kutty story please be patienceüòõ
I am new to Chennai which Dental clinic I have to choose ü§î ok let me Google it. "Best doctor for teeth alignment near my area(Perungalathur)" that's how it was started. Based on my expectation I filtered out Google results and visited more than 10 clinics and got to a conclusion 'Vignesh's Dental Zone'. Dr.Vignesh proved that my decision is right.
